sourcesContent:
<form>
  <ion-item>
    <ion-label position="stacked">Nom</ion-label>
    <ion-input type="text" name="nom" [(ngModel)]="nom" required></ion-input>
  </ion-item>

  <ion-item>
    <ion-label position="stacked">Prénom</ion-label>
    <ion-input type="text" name="prenom" [(ngModel)]="prenom" required></ion-input>
  </ion-item>

  <ion-button expand="block" type="submit" (click)="savePerson()">Enregistrer</ion-button>
</form>
